articles.title: After California massacres, Asian Americans shoulder the grief - The Washington Post
articles.description: More mass killings, more collective grief — and this time, Asian Americans and immigrants are shouldering the bulk of the agony.

articles.author: Murtaza Hussain, Ryan Grim
articles.title: Elon Musk Removes BBC Doc at Request of India PM Modi - The Intercept
articles.description: Officials from India’s ruling right-wing party said American tech companies like Twitter and YouTube complied with demands to remove the documentary.
articles.content:

articles.author: Nathaniel Meyersohn
articles.title: America's largest private employer just hiked wages - CNN
articles.description: Walmart, America's largest private employer, said Tuesday that it will raise its minimum wage from $12 to $14 an hour as it tries to retain store and warehouse workers in a tight labor market for lower-wage industries.

articles.author: Terry Tang And Jamie Stengle
articles.title: 'Last dance': Those slain in California shooting remembered - CP24
articles.description: Mymy Nhan was a regular at the Star Ballroom for more than a decade, choosing the Los Angeles-area dance hall popular with older Asian Americans as the place to “start the year fresh" with Lunar New Year celebrations, her niece said Monday.
